zh.title: 国际原子能机构大会召开，讨论核安全
东德领导人埃里希·昂纳克下台
阿塞拜疆宣布恢复国家独立
波音777首次跨太平洋飞行
缅甸全国和平与发展委员会改组
巴基斯坦卡拉奇爆炸袭击，多人伤亡
新西兰工党领袖杰辛达·阿德恩就任总理
全球首个完全由AI设计的药物进入临床试验

en.title: German Autumn ends with the death of the Baader-Meinhof leaders.
East German leader Erich Honecker is ousted from power.
Azerbaijan declares independence from the Soviet Union.
Michael Schumacher wins his second Formula One World Championship.
The film "Antz" is released, pioneering CGI animation.
Benazir Bhutto returns to Pakistan after eight years in exile.
Canberra Airport becomes the first airport in the world to implement a full body scanner.
Hurricane Norma makes landfall in Baja California Sur, Mexico.
